actions.committee: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Oversight and Government Reform
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution and Civil Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution and Civil Justice

official_title: To restore the traditional day of observance of Memorial Day, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Restores the observance of Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30th of each year.

titles.title: To restore the traditional day of observance of Memorial Day, and for other purposes.
